data.actual_result: The message in the notification body text doesn't have the "\\" characters
data.expected_result: It shows the message as it normally appears
data.short_description: Push notifications don't show the message correctly if the "\\" character is contained
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone send a message containing the "\\" character at least once (example: the shrug (`¯\_(ツ)_/¯`) - Look at the push notification and observe the message (in the above example it will show `¯_(ツ)_/¯` parsing the "\\" as an escape character)
